itemLabel: Philip Norton, Baron Norton of Louth

wikipedia_page.main: Philip Norton, Baron Norton of Louth,  FAcSS FRHistS Hon LLD (born 5 March 1951), is an English author, academic and Conservative peer. He has been described as "the United Kingdom's greatest living expert on Parliament" and "a world authority on constitutional issues."

response: *Philip Norton, Baron Norton of Louth (born 5 March 1951), leading expert on the British Parliament, Conservative politician, author and Professor of Politics at the University of Hull
